title: alamElu mangai ni
sahitya:
Alamelu Manga ni abhinava roopamu |Jalajaakshu kannulaku chavulicche vamma  ||caraNam 1

Garudachala Dheesu Ghana vakshamuna nundi |Paramananda  sambharita vai  ||Nerathanamulu joopi nirantharmu nadhuni |Harushimpa ga jesiti gadamma  ||
caraNam 2

Sasi kiranamulaku chaluvala choopulu |Visadhamuga meeda vedajalluchu  ||Rasikatha pempuna kariginchi eppudu ni  |Vasamu jesukonti vallabhu noyamma  ||caraNam 3

Rattadi sri venkataraayuniki neevu  |Pattapu raanivai paraguchu  ||Vatti maaku ligirinchu valapu maatala vibhu  |Jatti goni yuramuna satha maithivamma  ||
